verbs.description: australia needles - in - strawberries crisis [V: has] reportedly spread to 2 more countries strawberries containing needles have been reported in new zealand and singapore after officials in australia earlier said there had been 100 reports of needles found in fruit there needles were found in a punnet in auckland and a man said he found a sharp metal object in a punnet in mahota apple australian government the new paper fairprice new zealand auckland stuart smith countdown store perth cnn veterinary authority of singapore perth western australia australia government of australia singapore prime minister tv new zealand scott morrison south wales queensland the straits times sheng siong western australia straits times mahota officer woolworths
